column2: [From.GetBestName] has seen fit to sponsor the creation of [GetBonSocietyName], a society where like-minded individuals can work together to strive to better themselves in the search of enlightenment and closeness to one another and to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].\nSeeing as all [From.Religion.GetName] rulers also are [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] and the other [From.Religion.GetName] deities, [GetBonSocietyName] will likely have a role to play in both spiritual and temporal affairs.
They do not offer enlightenment, only falsehoods!
